item.title: How to use Wiremock with HTTPS
item.description: Introduction Wiremock is an awesome HTTP stubbing librabry which can be ued to mock end points. It is super simple and can be used as a standalone server. The beauty is that it can be used to stub SSL endpoints making it very versatile and easier to use. Step 1 - Generate a self signed certificate keytool.exe -genkey -alias wiremock -keyalg RSA -keysize 1024 -validity 365 -keypass password -keystore wiremockKS.
